effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for five turns. Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends. If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends. If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for five turns. Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends. If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends. If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User is forced to use this move for five turns. Power doubles every time this move is used in succession to a maximum of 16x, and resets to normal after the lock-in ends. If this move misses or becomes unusable, the lock-in ends. If the user has used defense curl since entering the field, this move has double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.
